fr.polytech.prd.plateforme.controler

Class StreamControler

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.polytech.prd.plateforme.controler.StreamControler

  • public class StreamControler
extends java.lang.Object
    StreamControler is the class that handle with the stream to run

    StreamControler starts a stream by calling a StreamView class and running the streamlink command

    Author:
    Romain ROUSSEAU

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StreamControler.PlayMediaObserver
      Observer class that calls its update method in two cases: When the log displays "Stream ended" and there is no stream left to run, the program will terminate.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) TVChannel channel
      TVChannel object to keep the attribute of the channel read in memory.
      (package private) org.slf4j.Logger log
      Logger object that displays informations to the user
      private StreamControler.PlayMediaObserver pmo
      PlayMediaObserver that will observe the TextInpuStreamControler thread.
      private java.lang.Integer port
      Integer that represents the communication port in which the stream will be read.
      private java.lang.String quality
      Quality to give to streamlink.
      private StreamView streamview
      Viewer of the stream.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StreamControler(TVChannel channel)
      Constructor of the StreamControler.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void launchStream()
      Method that launches the stream.
      void run()
      Run a thread that execute streamlink program and a TextInputStreamControler thread that read the log input.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • log

        org.slf4j.Logger log
        Logger object that displays informations to the user

        private StreamControler.PlayMediaObserver pmo
        PlayMediaObserver that will observe the TextInpuStreamControler thread.

      • streamview

        private StreamView streamview
        Viewer of the stream.

      • channel

        TVChannel channel
        TVChannel object to keep the attribute of the channel read in memory.

      • quality

        private java.lang.String quality
        Quality to give to streamlink. Set to best by default.

      • port

        private java.lang.Integer port
        Integer that represents the communication port in which the stream will be read.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StreamControler

        public StreamControler(TVChannel channel)
        Constructor of the StreamControler. The parameter is the channel that will be read.
        Parameters:
        channel: - channel that will be read

    • Method Detail

      • launchStream

        public void launchStream()
        Method that launches the stream. Create a StreamView object and call the run() method.

      • run

        public void run()
        Run a thread that execute streamlink program and a TextInputStreamControler thread that read the log input.
